title: Classic Trucks Quiz
description: Haul up your memory and recall facts about iconic trucks and commercial vehicles

questions.question: The Ford F-Series has been the best-selling truck in the United States for over how many consecutive years?
The Chevrolet Silverado gets its name from what?
The Volkswagen Type 2, better known as the VW Bus or Microbus, was first produced in which decade?
The Toyota Hilux is famous for its extreme what?
A 'pickup truck' is distinguished from other trucks by having what?
options: An open cargo bed behind the cab

questions.question: The Dodge Power Wagon, introduced in 1945, was one of the first civilian trucks based on what?
options: A World War II military truck

questions.question: The Mack Trucks company is known for what animal on its hood ornament?
The International Harvester Scout, produced from 1961 to 1980, was an early competitor to which vehicle?
What does 'GVW' or 'GVWR' stand for in truck specifications?
The Kenworth and Peterbilt brands are famous for manufacturing what type of truck?
A 'flatbed truck' is characterized by having what kind of cargo area?
options: A flat, open platform with no sides or roof

questions.question: The Land Rover Defender, originally called the Land Rover Series I, was first produced in which country?
The GMC brand is a division of which major American automotive company?
A 'cab-over' truck design means the cab is positioned where relative to the engine?
The El Camino, produced by Chevrolet, was notable for being a hybrid between what two vehicle types?
